EmailTemplate.description: Template to set expectations for any feature request we receive.
EmailTemplate.name: Feature Request Received
EmailTemplate.subject: We value your input - Thank you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
We would like to thank you very much for your time and efforts in providing feedback on our software functionality and design. It is your ideas that help improve and gear our software usability to the dealer experience.
The case described below will be escalated to our team for review and evaluation. These ideas and/or changes are weighed for cause and effect across many different aspects of our software for all dealers. You may not receive immediate feedback or any ETA on when such changes would be seen in the future.
Thank you very much for your time and efforts.
Best regards,
VinSolutions Support Team,
Support@VinSolutions.com
800-980-7488
Case Subject: {!Case.Subject}
Case Description: {!Case.Description}
